nodes.text: Sith Hunters were specialized elite troops of the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
Sith Hunters were extremely skilled in combat. They wore heavy armor that could deflect and absorb blaster bolts.

Sith Hunters are Non-Player Characters (NPCs) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game files they are listed as more dangerous versions of the Rebel Heavy Trooper. They wear the same armor as Rebel weapons masters and are either called "a veteran Sith Hunter" or "a decorated Sith Hunter".

Sith Hunters only appear when a city or planetary region of the game has been under the control of Rebel-aligned players for a prolonged period of time. When they spawn, they patrol the area and attack all Imperial NPCs and players.
